{"id":889584564,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1675275685,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/889584564/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int left_sum=0,right_sum=accumulate(nums.begin(),nums.end(),0);\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            right_sum-=nums[i];\n            if(left_sum==right_sum)\n            return(i);\n            left_sum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        return(-1);\n        }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
